desc: Networks make it easy to share files, folders, music, printers, and more with other people in your home or office. This handy guide shows you how to create, use, and maintain a wired or wireless local network. Youâ€™ll learn how to set up hardware, exchange files, share equipment, add Windows PCs to your network, connect to the internet, set security options, tweak or troubleshoot connections, and more.
title: OS X Networking, El Capitan Edition
